info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Board and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Board with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Board with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Board with the requested ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Board to delete

204.description: Board with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Board and persists changes to storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Board to update

get.description: Find the attached Participants of the Board with the given ID

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

200.description: Participants attached to Board with requested ID was found

get.description: Find the attached Tasks of the Board with the given ID

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

200.description: Tasks attached to Board with requested ID was found

parameters.description: item count to render per page
